gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 118, Nets 110
gameRecap.excerpt: Jayson Tatum (41 points, 14 rebounds, five assists) leads the Celtics with his 25th career 40-point game as they defeat the Nets, 118-110. Jaylen Brown added 19 points and four assists in the victory, while Mikal Bridges tallied 27 points on 10-20 shooting. The Celtics improve to 42-12 on the season, while the Nets fall to 21-32.
